text: [Music] to get healthy plants a serial farmer must protect his plants from pests and disease especially the leaves so that there can for to synthesize at the maximum rate not only can these pests and disease destroyed the crops but they can also contaminate the crops and harvested produce making them unsuitable or even dangerous for human consumption whilst poppies may look picturesque among yellow rose seed red flowers their seed is very similar to oil seed rape seed so cannot be separated during harvest meaning when crushed for their oil poppy seeds will also be crushed contaminating the oil with poppy oil not what you expect to buy in a bottle oil bottle of own seed rare pile farmers protect their crops using an integrated approach which involves a combination of methods crop rotation cultivations and chemicals crop rotation a farmer will rotate or change the crop seed growers in a field each year he will aim to grow different types of crops each year or every few years crops like cereals potatoes oil seed rape and peas are not attacked by the same pests and diseases so by rotating their crops farmers avoid the build-up of pests and disease in the soil and hedges around the field which would then attack the crops in the field a father they also try to reduce pests by carrying out cultivations that will reduce the pest if these methods don't control the pests or disease then farmers will have to use chemical sprays the chemical sprays are applied using crops prayers that are controlled by a computer in the tractor cab and linked to GPS and sat-nav this means that the chemical can be applied with precision just where the disease pests are we DS this saves on the amount of chemical needed but also means that only infected areas are sprayed the use of chemicals on food crops is also subject to tight regulations farmers have to pass a test before they are allowed to do this job farm assurance schemes such as the red tractor assurance cream also set out lots of safety and environmental rules farmers will speak before they can sell their cereals for food

segments.text: [Music]
to get healthy plants a serial farmer
must protect his plants from pests and
disease especially the leaves so that
there can for to synthesize at the
maximum rate not only can these pests
and disease destroyed the crops but they
can also contaminate the crops and
harvested produce making them unsuitable
or even dangerous for human consumption
whilst poppies may look picturesque
among yellow rose seed red flowers their
seed is very similar to oil seed rape
seed so cannot be separated during
harvest meaning when crushed for their
oil poppy seeds will also be crushed
contaminating the oil with poppy oil not
what you expect to buy in a bottle oil
bottle of own seed rare pile farmers
protect their crops using an integrated
approach which involves a combination of
methods crop rotation cultivations
and chemicals crop rotation a farmer
will rotate or change the crop seed
growers in a field each year he will aim
to grow different types of crops each
year or every few years crops like
cereals potatoes oil seed rape and peas
are not attacked by the same pests and
diseases so by rotating their crops
farmers avoid the build-up of pests and
disease in the soil and hedges around
the field which would then attack the
crops in the field
a father they also try to reduce pests
by carrying out cultivations that will
reduce the pest
if these methods don't control the pests
or disease then farmers will have to use
chemical sprays the chemical sprays are
applied using crops prayers that are
controlled by a computer in the tractor
cab and linked to GPS and sat-nav this
means that the chemical can be applied
with precision just where the disease
pests are we DS this saves on the amount
of chemical needed but also means that
only infected areas are sprayed the use
of chemicals on food crops is also
subject to tight regulations farmers
have to pass a test before they are
allowed to do this job farm assurance
schemes such as the red tractor
assurance cream also set out lots of
safety and environmental rules farmers
will speak before they can sell their
cereals for food
